title: Call On Me
lyrics:
Feel it when you look at me
It's like you turn to bad from good, eh
Why would I let you slip away
When it's so obvious I'm hooked on you
And tell me who's gonna ignite you

The way I do it, don't lie to me

You got me feeling your vibe

We don't have to end it tonight

But I want you to take time

When it feels right

It'll be alright with me

I'm ready to fall in too deep

When you're ready too



Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)

Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl)



Anything that suits your taste

I'll do it to ya if you please, babe

Tell me, there's a fantasy

You're keeping locked and I'm the key

Ooh



And tell me who's gonna ignite you

The way I do it, don't lie to me

You got me feeling your vibe

We don't have to end it tonight

But I want you to take time

When it feels right

It'll be alright with me

I'm already falling too deep

When you're ready too



Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)

Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)



Yeah, just call on me

It's so obvious I'm hooked, eh

You got me feeling your vibe

And if you don't wanna end it tonight

Yeah, yeah, yeah



Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)

Just call on me

Just call on me

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)



Just call on me

Yeah, yeah, yeah

(Girl, girl, girl, ah)

Yeah, yeah, yeah

Just call on me
